<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hit the Dirt!](/Feats.aspx?ID=3157) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 111</row>

**Archetype** [Unexpected Sharpshooter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=123) (Level 4)

**Trigger**
A creature you can see attempts a ranged Strike against you.

</column>

---

You fling yourself out of harm's way. You [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81). Your movement gives you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. Regardless of whether or not the triggering attack hits, you land [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) after completing your Leap.

<title level="2">Hit the Dirt! leads to...</title>
[Leap and Fire](/Feats.aspx?ID=3179)
name: Hit the Dirt!
